casebody.data:
L & S PARTNERSHIP, LLC, Petitioner
v.
PHILADELPHIA ZONING BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT and Pennsport Civic Association, Respondents No. 50 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 3, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 3rd day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
